alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:49PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Campbell County through 1030 PM MDT... At 948 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Linch, or 27 miles west of Wright, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Tree Junction and Pumpkin Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
